publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4920.1 Des McNulty: Scottish Commissioner for Human Rights Bill—As an amendment to motion (S2M-4920) in the name of Robert Brown, insert at end "but, in doing so, directs the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body to restrict the annual funding it provides under paragraph 13 of schedule 1 to the Bill to £100,000 for the first financial year and £225,000 for the subsequent three financial years (the financial years being as defined in that paragraph) for functional costs, and only to authorise funding for staff costs and office costs on the basis of a robust business case being made." Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
